meanings.sent1: The nettlier plant had sharper thorns than the others in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The fabric felt nettlier against her skin than she had expected.
meanings.sent3: The nettlier bushes seemed to be playing a game of tag with the unsuspecting passersby.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like nettlier vines, entangling anyone who dared to listen.
meanings.sent5: The nettlier texture of the paper made it difficult to write on.

meanings.sent1: She brushed past the nettlier branches carefully to avoid getting scratched.
meanings.sent2: The cat moved nettlier through the dense undergrowth, hunting for its prey.
meanings.sent3: The wind blew nettlier, causing the leaves to rustle in protest.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to pass nettlier in the quiet solitude of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed nettlier after the heavy rainfall, carrying debris downstream.
